comments: The professor tries to make the class similar to industry (so he says) by making what is required vague. Make sure that you put in time on the homework and ask if you have questions about what is needed. I got slaughtered on the first homework, but once you put in the time and think about what is needed you can do well.
He is pretending like he is a good guy and helpful but he isn\'t. Grading is not fair and incomprehensive sometimes. He is really bad at teaching.

Good professor. Fun class- a little too much homework assigned- and the grading is a little random at times. BUT- he is understanding and will go the extra mile. Book purchase was questionable. Obsessed with Lbm (rather than si)

Professor has no idea what he is doing. Grades are arbitrary with the requirements usually unknown. Expect to lose a LOT of points for no reason. Nothing well explained, only some of notes posted. Textbook is used once, borrow from someone who did get it

Good guy, down to earth. Doesn\'t seem to have the material mastered...makes lots of mistakes on notes...etc. Never heard a professor say I will have to check the book. He was ok...but the HW assignments were a bit long........
